title: Cheese, pistachio and prune cake
description: Savoury cakes are very popular in France, they appear in boulangeries and with a side salad on lunch menus in chic cafés, but they’re most likely to appear at a picnic. They are super-simple to make and can be adapted to use whatever leftovers you have in your fridge – just follow the basic batter recipe and get creative with the fillings!
ingredients: 150g/5½oz soft goat’s cheese, cut into small pieces
